name: ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap
description: The ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() method displays the given ImageBitmap in the canvas associated with this rendering context. The ownership of the ImageBitmap is transferred to the canvas as well.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'transferFromImageBitmap()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
